string-array.name: promptList
string-array.item: {\"1\":\"Welcome! Let’s start by creating your character. Why don’t you give them a name?\", \"2\":\"Now let’s show that name off by printing it to the screen!\", \"3\":\"Before we go any further, we should double check that everything’s okay. What’s wrong with this line?\"}

string-array.name: hintList
string-array.item: {\"1\":\"Words are called strings and need to be surrounded by quotes (\\")\", \"2\":\"You can refer to something you\'ve saved as a variable by typing its name\", \"3\":\"Lines must end with a certain special character\"}
